remarks: Lemma for ~ chscl .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
chscl.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CH ) $.
chscl.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CH ) $.
chscl.3 $e |- ( ph -> B C_ ( _|_ ` A ) ) $.
chscl.4 $e |- ( ph -> H : NN --> ( A +H B ) ) $.
chscl.5 $e |- ( ph -> H ~~>v u ) $.
chscl.6 $e |- F = ( n e. NN |-> ( ( projh ` A ) ` ( H ` n ) ) ) $.
chscl.7 $e |- G = ( n e. NN |-> ( ( projh ` B ) ` ( H ` n ) ) ) $.
chscllem4 $p |- ( ph -> u e. ( A +H B ) ) $.
$d A n u $.
$d B n u $.
$d H n u $.
$d n ph $.
